snippet.title: Angelic - Lore Introduction
snippet.description:
The lore introduction trailer details the rich history of Angelic. Learn more about the rise and fall of mega corporations, the tragedy that gripped the outer colonies at the hands of the Infested, and a neo-human beacon calling you to riches.

For more info on the lore, please check the below links,

Symphony of the Forsaken Part 1: https://angelicthegame.com/blog/2020/07/12/angelic-developer-diary-5-symphony-of-the-forsaken-part-1/

Symphony of the Forsaken Part 2: https://angelicthegame.com/blog/2020/07/19/angelic-developer-diary-6-symphony-of-the-forsaken-part-2/

Be sure to check out our first vlog, which provides an in-depth look at core combat mechanics and showcases never-before-seen gameplay for Angelic: https://youtu.be/q16ZIuc474I 

Angelic combines turn-based strategy combat with a narrative RPG, all backed by a collaboratively crafting science-fiction setting thanks to blockchain technology. Get ready to shape a massive conflict in the dark and compelling universe of Angelic.


For more details:

https://discord.gg/qvQnCyX
https://t.me/angelicthegame
https://twitter.com/AngelicTheGame
https://metaversegamestudios.medium.com/
https://www.instagram.com/angelicthegame
https://www.facebook.com/angelicthegame
https://angelicthegame.com/blog
